original_text: It is like a grain of mustard seed, which, when it is sown in the earth, is less than all the seeds that be in the earth:
korean_text: 겨자씨 한 알과 같으니 땅에 심길 때에는 땅 위의 모든 씨보다 작은 것이로되

sentences.original_text: It is like a grain of mustard seed
which, when it is sown in the earth
is less than all the seeds
